  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimulationLogDisplayable, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class FxSimulationBar
extends javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane
implements SimulationLogDisplayable
    Simulation bar displaying simulation progress.
